A business user wants a quick way to edit a record's status and enter a custom due date field from the record's feed in Salesforce Mobile App.
What could be used to accomplish this?

discussion.content:

questions.question_text: What type of field cannot be used in a formula field?

discussion.content: You can't use long text area, encrypted, or Description fields in formulas. The value of a field can't depend on another formula that references it
